ys.succinct.xml.dom

Class SuccinctDom

  • java.lang.Object
    • ys.succinct.xml.dom.SuccinctDom

  • public class SuccinctDom
extends Object
    An object that contains all the succinct data structures to support DOM API. It's designed to have the only instance of the succinct DOM per an XML document.
    Author:
    Yauheni Shahun

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SuccinctDom(int[] parenthesisBits, int parenthesisCount, int[] nodeBits, int nodeCount, int[] attributeBits, int attributeCount, ElementStore elementStore, OrderedStore textStore, QNameStore attributeNameStore, OrderedStore attributeValueStore, int documentIndex, DocumentContext documentContext, String defaultNamespace, boolean isNamespaceAware)
      Constructs the succinct DOM.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getTextLength

        public int getTextLength(int ordinalIndex)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the length of the text

      • getTextSubstring

        public String getTextSubstring(int ordinalIndex,
                      int offset,
                      int count)
        Gets the substring of the character content of the text node.
        Parameters:
        ordinalIndex - the index of the node among all the text nodes
        offset - the position within the content that the substring starts from
        count - the length of the substring
        Returns:
        the substring value, or null if the offset is out of bound

      • getPseudoAttribute

        public String getPseudoAttribute(int ordinalIndex,
                        int reverseOffset)
        Gets the pseudo-attribute value of the non-text node (i.e. the CDATA, Comment, Processing Instruction).
        Parameters:
        ordinalIndex - the index of the node among all the non-text nodes
        reverseOffset - the offset in the reverse direction in the attribute bit string that identifies the attribute
        Returns:
        the string value

      • getPseudoAttributeLength

        public int getPseudoAttributeLength(int ordinalIndex,
                           int reverseOffset)
        Gets the length of the pseudo-attribute value of the non-text node.
        Parameters:
        ordinalIndex - the index of the node among all the non-text nodes
        reverseOffset - the offset in the reverse direction in the attribute bit string that identifies the attribute
        Returns:
        the length of the attribute value

      • getPseudoAttributeSubstring

        public String getPseudoAttributeSubstring(int ordinalIndex,
                                 int reverseOffset,
                                 int offset,
                                 int count)
        Gets the substring of the pseudo-attribute value of the non-text node.
        Parameters:
        ordinalIndex - the index of the node among all the non-text nodes
        reverseOffset - the offset in the reverse direction in the attribute bit string that identifies the attribute
        offset - the position within the content that the substring starts from
        count - the length of the substring
        Returns:
        the substring value, or null if the offset is out of bound
